Deryk Stoneshaper was a dwarven warrior and stone mason who inhabitaned Phlan around 1367 DR.
Deryk led a contingent of a hundred dwarves who were drawn to Phlan for the vast of amount of stone work that needed to be completed among the citys numerous ruins. If needed, Deryk and his boys would not hesitate to defend Phlan.
